data.title: Marty Feldman 'In God We Trust'
data.meta_description: just happened to catch this on cable over the weekend. we're not talking an academy award or anything but we enjoyed it. quite a cast for something...
data.text:
just happened to catch this on cable over the weekend. we're not talking an academy award or anything but we enjoyed it. quite a cast for something that apparently didn't do too well:

marty feldman

louise lasser

peter boyle

andy kaufman

richrad pryor

wilfred hyde white

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0080917/

any fans of this film?

I've never seen it. I bet I'd enjoy it. I noticed that he directed. He also directed The Last Remake Of Beau Geste....which might have been his very last film? It is also a title that doesn't get around much. I saw his Beau Geste in the cinema. I don't know if it even got released on any format other than VHS...? I recorded my copy off Universal HD back before they had commercial breaks in the movies.

I'll put in a Tivo search and see if I can get In God We Trust.
